# POST /v1/appEvents | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

Web Service Endpoint# POST /v1/appEvents

App Store Connect API 1.7+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEvents#url)



```
POST https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appEvents
```

## [HTTP Body](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEvents#http-body)

`[AppEventCreateRequest`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventcreaterequest)

 Content-Type: application/json ## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEvents#response-codes)

` 201 Created``[AppEventResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appeventresponse)`Created`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 409 Conflict``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Conflict`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 422 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`` Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/POST-v1-appEvents#see-also)
